div.p: This provides a list of changes to the SDC-DE specification since its initial release
2017-03-20 v2.0 - SDC-DE R2 (STU) Official Publication based on FHIR R3 (STU)

ul.li: Updated profiles on all resources to align with changes to underlying resources.
Revamped rendering of IG to be easier to navigate

div.p: 2016-08-11 v1.6 - SDC-DE R2 (STU) Ballot Candidate based on FHIR R3 (STU) ballot candidate

ul.li: ValueSet and DataElement resources including alignment of data elements and search criteria.

Added a profile for the new CodeSystem resource which has now been split out from ValueSet. The new profile reflects the constraints and extensions that have been moved over from the SDC Valueset profile

div.p: 2015-10-24 v1.0 - SDC-DE R2 (DSTU) Official Publication based on FHIR R2 (DSTU) publication
